channel.title: Inconsistency with "Unhealable"
channel.description:
Stab = assassin kill with no modifiers unless specified otherwise
N1: Sheriff is Stabbed, reaped and healed by a physician D2: Sheriff is dead
Thus reap makes the target unhealable rather than just having an unhealable attack
N3: MM is wolfed N4: MM is reaped and healed D5: ???
People are saying the MM should survive even though reap should make him unhealable
Hypothesis: Attack on immune considered unsuccessful?
Experiment: Use Possess on MM. If attacks on immunes are considered unsuccessful then he will regain a use
Result: Possessor does no regain a use on immune targets. Immune targets are not considered failures
Hypothesis 2: Unhealable attacks only make the target unhealable if the attack kills them
Experiment:
D2: Poison Reaper N2: RE and heal reaper
If he still is poisoned D3 then the Hypothesis is correct
ERROR: Reaper removes poison on consume regardless of heal
Alternative Experiment:
D2: Poison Reaper N2: RE and heal reaper
The physician should revive a message about removing poison from the target
Result: ???
IF YOU HAVE INFORMATION ON ANY OF THESE PLEASE POST IT HERE. IF YOU HAVEN'T TESTED THIS THEN DON'T ASSUME YOU KNOW THE RESULT
